A video supposedly documenting that the shootings at Sandy Hook Elementary
School were a staged hoax is full of misinformation.

Image via StillCallsMeSon / Shutterstock.com

  Claim

   A video documents that the shootings at Sandy Hook Elementary School were
   a staged hoax.

Chris Rodia himself was not at Sandy Hook Elementary when the
       shootings took place; he was driving a different vehicle in another
       town at the time.

The six first-graders somehow had escaped from Sandy Hook Elementary
     School as a gunman shot and killed 20 young students and six educators.
